title: Our inheritance from historic Greece
brief_description: Illustrates aspects of modern everyday life which can be traced back to that of the ancient Greeks. Aspects discussed are architecture, dress, ideas such as democracy, word derivations, electricity, zoology, mathematics and botany. Each element is depicted in its present-day use as well as its ancient Greek origin.
